dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model.expr
Interface IMExpr

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractMExpr, MAnd, MChild, MFrom, MNot, MOr, MParent, MRef, MSchema, MTree, MXPath, MXPathFilter
public interface IMExpr

This expression engine is used by DCtxt.getAll( IMExpr ) and other methods of the DCtxt API to produce a list of contexts. Use [@link AbstractMExpr} as base class for custom expressions:

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Since:
2008.a

Method Summary
 java.util.List<DCtxt> eval(java.util.List<DCtxt> contexts)
          Maps a list of input context to a list of output contexts.
 

Method Detail

eval

java.util.List<DCtxt> eval(java.util.List<DCtxt> contexts)
                           throws CtxtException
Maps a list of input context to a list of output contexts. If the expression supports sub-expressions a left associate evaluation should be performed. This means this expressions is evaluated first and the resulting contexts are handed to the sub-expressions. The contexts returned by the sub-expressions are then returned further unreflected by this eval() method.

Parameters:
contexts - The input contexts to map
Returns:
The output contexts
Throws:
CtxtException - in case of an error
Since:
2008.a
